snippet: The era of Ken Follett’s new novel is illuminated only slightly by the characters who wander through it.
abstract: Janet Maslin reviews book Winter of the World: Book Two of the Century Trilogy by Ken Follett.
lead_paragraph: The era of Ken Follett’s new novel is illuminated only slightly by the characters who wander through it.

headline.seo: Ken Follett Offers Second Volume of Century Trilogy
headline.main: History Measured in War, Sex and Berets
headline.print_headline: History Measured In War, Sex And Berets
